squidpony.squidgrid.util

Interface RadiusStrategy3D

  • All Superinterfaces:
    RadiusStrategy
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicRadiusStrategy

    @Beta
public interface RadiusStrategy3D
extends RadiusStrategy
    Indicates which method of dealing with the radius during FOV and LOS solving is preferred.
    Author:
    Eben Howard - http://squidpony.com - howard@squidpony.com
